tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had previously given rather a negative feedback on the doctor based on just one experience that my dad-in-law went through.  However,  not only did the doctor clarify what had happened that day because of which my dad-in-law had a bad experience but also reminded me that I have been consulting him since 2015. Thank you doctor. 

But, coming back to my experience, Dr. Bharath patiently listens to your problems,  suggests treatment, and makes sure you're fine. He never suggests anything that's unreasonable.  He in fact did a re root canal as another dentist had spoiled it for me. I was in deep pain for almost 2 months. Dr. Bharath gave me confidence that it can be corrected. And, as he promised, he corrected it, didn't suggest to go for new set of crowns and made the existing ones work for me.

I would definitely recommend Dr. Bharath  to anyone who's looking for a good dentist in and around Singasandra. 

Message to the doctor: I have deleted the negative comment as you don't deserve that. Thank you for responding with what had happened.  They are elderly,  and as kids sometimes we get bothered if they go through any amount of difficulty.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Cleaning,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Teeth Whitening,Tooth Air Polishing,
review:
Dr.Bharath made sure my tooth pain reduced. There was so much severe pain that I didn't have proper sleep. When I visited the place. Dr.Bharath took the scanning and found the exact problem.  *** ********* ** ********** After visiting him the pain reduced in just 2 days completely. I was treated with RC(Root Canal) and Cleaning and Polishing. 

I was recommended by a Friend and his recommendation turned out to be a right place **** *** ************* ********
Thanks to Dr.Bharath for treating my concern on priority and thanks to his colleagues who were always there to help.

At the end. I have a clean n shiny Teeth üòÅ.  I'll surely recommend my Family, Relatives and Friends to Dr. Bharath.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I'm very much scared of the equipment itself in dental clinic but this is the first place to doctor was so good and I didn't had to worry much. Quick process and pain less almost, didn't have to wait and post treatment also I had no pain, infact it was more how I was before RCT. **** **** ****** **** ** **** **** ****** *** *** ********** Anyone scared like me can visit here for friendly and quick and painless treatment. I strongly recommend and you can feel my word once you visit. Thanks to Dr. Bharath

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Crowns, Tooth Extraction,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: I am a senior citizen and was apprehensive to undergo dental treatment during Covid crisis. This is my first visit to this clinic which was recommended by my family friend. Dr Bharath was extremely patient in understanding the problem, explained the treatment procedure, unlike many places where the doctor keeps a time limit of 10 mins per patient. I underwent root canal, extraction and crown fixing. The procedures were carried out expertly, the fitment of the crown was perfect without repeated trials. The cost of treatment was nominal.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ****** ******** ** ********** He explains the things accurately and is excellent in his work. At first I got his number from Google and I sent a message in whatsapp. I had contacted many dentists before meeting him but since it was lockdown no one replied. But to my surprise on the same day itself Dr. Bharath replied and asked for a video call to see the condition of my tooth. Since it was lockdown and the clinic was not opened he recommended some medicines. This shows his sincerity in work. And after lockdown I had my root canal treatment successfully (with no pain,the best partüòç). I would recommend everyone to meet him for tooth related issues. 

Thank you
